Package fr.inria.lille.shexjava.schema

Class ShexSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.inria.lille.shexjava.schema.ShexSchema
  • @Stable
public class ShexSchema
extends Object
    A ShEx schema. An instance of this class represents a well-defined schema, that is, all shape labels are defined, there are no circular dependences between ShapeExprRef or TripleExprRef, and the set of rules is stratified. The set of rules is not modifiable after construction. All ShapeExpr and TripleExpr in the constructed schema have a Label, allowing to refer to the corresponding expression. The stratification is a most refined stratification.
    Author:
    Iovka Boneva, Antonin Durey, Jérémie Dusart
